articles.description:
Send in your applications for D_D Women's hacker scholarship 🚀🚀

D_D Women: Applications are still open for our D_D Women  Scholarship!! 
We're sending hackers to @ETHGlobal Lisbon in Portugal! We will be giving out $1000 to each selected hacker and the opportunity to learn, build and make friends

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Haz Æ 41
How @BrumeWallet uses Tor to hide your IP address from Ethereum RPCs
It creates an end-to-end encrypted tunnel between your computer and the Ethereum RPC
This tunnel is in fact a path of 3 Tor nodes that encrypt and route your packets back-and-forth between your computer and… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1646827631634010113 https://t.co/y7QyVn3isP

articles.description:
RT Megabyte ᵍᵐ (🧱,🚀)
Reddit partnered with Polygon to bring NFTs to 7+ million people 🤯
How? They didn’t require users to know anything about crypto.
I just released a guide on how you can recreate the @Reddit Marketplace on @0xPolygon. 👇
It allows email signup and gasless transfer of NFTs 🤩
